thread.title: Bella Hadid shows off decolletage in low cut denim dress
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid shows off decolletage in low cut denim dress | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Bella Hadid shows off decolletage in low cut denim dress

organizations.name: asos tall denim belted midi dress
asos denim bethany button through midi dress
asos denim premium textured minimal midi dress

text:
She's taking the denim trend to the next level.
And Bella Hadid was rocking it like a pro on Tuesday night when she hit the streets of New York for a night out on the town at NY Poison Club hosted by Dior.
After spending the day with big sister Gigi, the 20-year-old model emerged solo, but later met brother Anwar at the event.
Denim dream! Bella Hadid, 20, was rocking it like a pro on Tuesday night when she hit the streets of New York for a night out on the town in a denim dress
Always on trend, Bella wore the balconette-style Christian Dior denim dress with sparkly straps and a glittering choker with a long chain that went down into her cleavage.
The denim ensemble cinched at her waist and created a flattering silhouette as is cascaded out around her hips.
To keep warm in the cold New York temperatures, the gorgeous brunette wore a black fur shawl around her shoulders.
She finished off the outfit with sky-high strappy black sandals and appeared to be getting right into a waiting car as she was not dressed to walk the cold streets.
Close siblings: Bella and Anwar show affection at the Dior event as they remain close for the evening
Trend alert: The denim ensemble cinched at her waist and created a flattering silhouette as is cascaded out around her hips
Gorgeous style: The Victoria Secret model looked fabulous with her dark hair dramatically straight and parted right down the center
Crisp night: To keep warm in the cold New York temperatures, the gorgeous brunette wore a black fur shawl around her shoulders
Do it in denim like Bella wearing Dior Dior denim corset dress
Get the look below!
Buy now
Bella and Gigi Hadid have become fashion royalty since taking the model scene by storm! But tonight, it was her younger brother Anwar that Bella was partying with.
The stylish siblings were attending a Dior event at NY Poison Club, joined by the likes of Toni Garrn, Camille Rowe and Harley Viera Newton.
Bella looked amazing in a denim midi dress featuring corset detail and glitter logo embellished straps. As she showed, denim isn't just for the daytime!
Although you'd normally associate denim with the likes of casual jeans and jackets, choosing this stalwart material for an eveningwear look is a great way to keep your style feeling fresh.
So to dress up your denim like Bella, head to our edit below and team any of our must-have midis with some simple black strappy sandals to channel Bella's look.

The Victoria Secret model looked fabulous with her dark hair dramatically straight and parted right down the center.
She wore the front of it behind her ears, which allowed it to frame her gorgeous face.
The daughter of Yolanda wore a light sprinkle of foundation on her flawless complexion and wore dramatic eye makeup to make her ears appear cat-like.
She also decided on dark lipstick to add a pop of color to her ensemble.
Making him jealous: Bella, who has been mending a broken heart after breaking up with The Weeknd late last year, gave her ex something to miss
Party time! Bella let loose on the dancefloor in the midst of the New York club
Palling up: Bella looked like she was having a great time as she caught up with pals at the event
Flawless: Bella showed off her flawless ski, sporting smokey black eyeliner and dusky lipstick
The model turned up at NY Poison Club hosted by Dior with Camille Rowe in the city with brother Anwar.
The two posed for a few photos, showing their close relationship as they cuddled close in various pictures at the event.
Anwar was seen wearing a black and red jacket to the event and it appears he didn't have time to go home and change as it's the same one he was wearing earlier in the day.
The event was meant to promote Dior's Poison Girl campaign fronted by Camille Rowe, who was on hand to help with the evenings festivities.
Serious stuff: Bella showed off her model pout as she posed for snaps inside the event
Friends in high places: Anwar and Bella pose with nightclub owner Richie Akiva at the venue
Sibling support: Anwar was seen leaving Gigi's apartment earlier int he day in the same outfit
Pair of models: Bella posed with fellow model Rachel Hilbert at the Dior event
Strike a pose: Bella and Anwar larked around with friends at the club
Model behaviour: Bella and her good looking friends were enjoying the chance to let their hair down
Heely good: Bella sported towering strappy black shoes with a pointed heel
German model Tori Garrn was also on hand to celebrate the fashion designer, wearing a mesh see through top with a velvet blazer concealing her breasts.
She paired it with a pair of black flared pants and dark red pumps.
She wore her blonde hair in a loose updo with much of her hair loosely falling around her face.
Anwar hangs out with fellow model Luka Sabbat just outside the event Tuesday night
A bevvy of models: German model Tori Garrn was also on hand to celebrate the fashion designer, wearing a mesh see through top with a velvet blazer
Woman of the hour: Model Camille Rowe is the face of Dior's Poison Girl campaign
Exclusive guest list: Actress Mia Moretti also showed up for the event
Star studded: DJ Harley Viera-Newton attends NY Poison Club hosted by Dior with Camille Rowe on January 31, 2017 in New York City
